title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Unified the model used by Coding Agent for all users to `cca_current_model`, removing distinctions between Business/Enterprise and Pro/Pro+ tiers.
Removed references to Claude Sonnet 4.5 as the model for Pro/Pro+ users and its public preview status.
Updated the models reference table to mark Claude Opus 4.1 as unsupported in agent mode.
summary:
- Unified the model used by Coding Agent for all users to `cca_current_model`, removing distinctions between Business/Enterprise and Pro/Pro+ tiers.
- Removed references to Claude Sonnet 4.5 as the model for Pro/Pro+ users and its public preview status.
- Updated the models reference table to mark Claude Opus 4.1 as unsupported in agent mode.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Unified the model used by Coding Agent for all users to `cca_current_model`, removing distinctions between Business/Enterprise and Pro/Pro+ tiers.
- Removed references to Claude Sonnet 4.5 as the model for Pro/Pro+ users and its public preview status.
- Updated the models reference table to mark Claude Opus 4.1 as unsupported in agent mode.

### Title
Remove Sonnet 4.5 and disable Opus 4.1 for Coding Agent model
